channel.title: 动画 on 郑欢的学习总结

item.title: 动画
item.description: 类设计 原理图 AnimationController() /// An [AnimationController] needs a [TickerProvider], which is configured using /// the `vsync` argument on the constructor. /// /// The [TickerProvider] interface describes a factory for [Ticker] objects. A /// [Ticker] is an object that knows how to register itself with the /// [SchedulerBinding] and fires a callback every frame. The /// [AnimationController] class uses a [Ticker] to step through the animation /// that it controls.
